mapper.select:
select pa.serialnumber as chassi , pa.billing_date__c::timestamp as salesDate , pa.dealercode__c as salesDealerCode , (select corporaterepresentativename__c from process.account where row_id = pa.account_row_id__c) as salesDealerNick , pa.oper_status_cd__c as salesCode , version__c as salesVersion , pa.fsc__c as salesFscocn , (select pp.engine_desc__c from process.product pp where pp.row_id = pa.product2id) as salesMotor , pa.friendly_model__c as vinModel , (select ci.val from process.color_information ci where ci.lang_id__c = 'ENU' and ci."type" = 'AUTO_EXTERIOR' and ci.name_code = pa.vehiclecolor__c) as vinColor , pa.legacy_last_upd::timestamp as updated , pa.x_del_home__c as delHome , pa.x_dig_sales__c as digitalSales , pa.x_td_home__c as tdHome , pa.x_sales_cancel_dt__c as salesCancelled , pa.row_id as assetId , pa.account_row_id__c as bAccountId , pa.contact_row_id__c as cAccountId from process.asset pa where
pa.legacy_created = to_date(#{dateInput}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
pa.billing_date__c = to_date(#{dateInput}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and pa.oper_status_cd__c != 'ZV02'
and pa.oper_status_cd__c = 'ZV02'
and pa.serialnumber = #{vin}

select pa.row_id as idSiebel , ac.relation_type_cd as relatedType , ac.status_cd as relatedStatus , ( case when pa.calloptyn__pc = true then 'Y' when pa.calloptyn__pc = false then 'N' else null end ) as suppressAllCalls , ( case when pa.emailoptyn__pc = true then 'Y' when pa.emailoptyn__pc = false then 'N' else null end ) as suppressAllEmails , ( case when pa.directmailoptyn__pc = true then 'Y' when pa.directmailoptyn__pc = false then 'N' else null end ) as suppressAllMailings , ( case when pa.blockedmobile__c = true then 'Y' when pa.blockedmobile__c = false then 'N' else null end ) as suppressAllMobilePhone , ( case when pa.blockedsms__c = true then 'Y' when pa.blockedsms__c = false then 'N' else null end ) as suppressAllSMS , ( case when pa.x_printed_card__c = true then 'Y' when pa.x_printed_card__c = false then 'N' else null end ) as suppressAllVideoCall , ( case when pa.blockedwhatsapp__c = true then 'Y' when pa.blockedwhatsapp__c = false then 'N' else null end ) as suppressAllWhatsapp from process.account pa join process.customer_vehicle ac on pa.row_id = ac.account_id where ac.account_id = #{cAccountId} and ac.cv_type = 'Person' limit 1

select pa.row_id as idSiebel , aa.relation_type_cd as relatedType , aa.status_cd as relatedStatus from process.account pa join process.customer_vehicle aa on pa.row_id = aa.account_id where aa.account_id = #{cAccountId} and aa.cv_type = 'Business'
